name: PDFAnnotationSubtype
desc: The type of annotation, such as circle, text, or ink.

items.name: static let circle: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that renders a circle shape.

items.name: static let freeText: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays an editable text field.

items.name: static let ink: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that represents a freehand scribble.

items.name: static let line: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays a single straight line.

items.name: static let link: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that provides a hyperlink to a location in the document, or an action to perform when the user clicks or taps it.

items.name: static let popup: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays text in a pop-up window for entry and editing.

items.name: static let square: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays a square shape.

items.name: static let stamp: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays text or a graphic as if a rubber stamp imprints it on the page.

items.name: static let strikeOut: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that strikes out text.

items.name: static let text: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays a collapsible note that contains text.

items.name: static let widget: PDFAnnotationSubtype
items.desc: An annotation that displays interactive form elements, including text or signature fields, radio buttons, checkboxes, push buttons, pop-ups, and tables.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an annotation subtype using the specified raw string.
